thread.title: Excellent place and experience
thread.title_full: Excellent place and experience - Review of Hotel Motte Picquet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: OChalofn
title: Excellent place and experience
text: Outstanding location, blocks from the Eiffel Tower, the Seine, and around the corner from Rue Cler. Boutique hotel with attractive room, nice bath, and excellent customer service. Maurice at the front desk, was "over-the-top" helpful in recommending sights to see, on directions to wherever you wanted to go, restaurants.... Just a sincerely friendly person. Would definitely recommend and would, without question, stay here again.
